H0.text: What city had the largest library in the ancient world. Alexandria

H1.text: What city had the largest library in the ancient world. Babylon

H2.text: What city had the largest library in the ancient world. Pergamon

H3.text: What city had the largest library in the ancient world. Louran

A4.text: The Library of Alexandria was one of the largest and most significant libraries of the ancient world.

A5.text: It is unknown precisely how many scrolls were housed at any given time, but estimates range from 40,000 to 400,000 at its height.
